field.name: AUTO_FIT
field.comment: Creates as many columns as can fit on screen.

method.name: LoadFontFromAssets
method.comment: Create a new typeface from the specified font data from assets.

method.name: LoadFontFromFile
method.comment: Create a new typeface from the specified font data from sdcard.

field.name: Monospace
field.comment: The NORMAL style of the default monospace typeface.

field.name: Sans_Serif
field.comment: The NORMAL style of the default sans serif typeface.

field.name: Style_Bold_Italic
field.comment: The default BOLD ITALIC style int.

field.name: Serif
field.comment: The NORMAL style of the default serif typeface.

class.name: it.giuseppe.salvi.gridview.library.core.GridViewWrapper
class.event: ItemClick(Position As Int, Value As Object)
ItemLongClick(Position As Int, Value As Object)

method.name: GetIndividualCacheDir
method.comment: Returns individual application cache directory (for only image caching from ImageLoader). Cache directory will be created on SD card ("/Android/data/[app_package_name]/cache/b4AGridview-Images") if card is mounted and app has appropriate permission. Else - Android defines cache directory on device's file system.

method.name: AddImageAt
method.comment: Add an image from sdcard or AssetsDir to the desired position in the GridView

method.name: ClearMemoryCache
method.comment: Clears memory cache

method.name: ShareItemsTo
method.comment: Share any items to ? app: name item: subJect: message: shareTo:

method.name: ClearDiskCache
method.comment: Clears disk cache.

method.name: ShowFromWeb
method.comment: Populate GridView from web

method.name: ShowFromSdCard
method.comment: Populate GridView from sdcard

method.name: SetText2
method.comment: Sets the string value of the TextView.

method.name: Initialize2
method.comment: Initialize the object and set own cache directory

method.name: ShowActionBarToShare
method.comment:
Sets the icons on action bar
Example: Dim icons() As String = Array As String("gmail.png","email.png","gmx.png","dropbox.png","facebook.png","twitter.png","telegram.png","line.png") icons: as array

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialize the object

method.name: StopEngine
method.comment: Cancels all running and scheduled display image tasks. NOTE: This method doesn't shutdown if you set them. ImageLoader still can be used after calling this method.

method.name: GoToWebsite
method.comment:
Go to web site by given an address
Example:
GoToWebsite("www.example.com") url:

method.name: SetText
method.comment: Sets the string value of the TextView.

method.name: AddImageFromWeb
method.comment: Add an image from web at the end of the GridView

method.name: ShowFromAssets
method.comment: Populate GridView from assets or assets/sub-folder

method.name: DestroyEngine
method.comment: Stops ImageLoader and clears current configuration. Use this option on exit app.

method.name: AddImage
method.comment: Add an image from sdcard or AssetsDir at the end of the GridView

method.name: isPauseOnScroll
method.comment: Whether pause ImageLoader during touch scrolling

method.name: TextBackGroundColor
method.comment: Sets the background color for this view. by default red = 0 by default green = 0 by default blue = 0

method.name: GetCacheDir
method.comment:
Returns application cache directory. Cache directory will be created on SD card ("/Android/data/[app_package_name]/cache") if card is mounted and app has appropriate permission. Else - Android defines cache directory on device's file system. Return type: @return:Cache {@link File directory}.
NOTE: Can be null in some unpredictable cases (if SD card is unmounted)

method.name: ShareTextUrlTo
method.comment: Share any text to ? subject: text: message: shareTo:

method.name: GetArrayList
method.comment: Get or Sets an array.

method.name: GetImageListFromAssets
method.comment: Get entire list of images stored in assets or sub-folder Examples: Dim lv as ListView Dim l as list l.Initialize lv.Initialize("lv") Sub Menu_Click Activity.AddView(lv,0,0,100%x,100%y) l = GridView.GetImageListFromAssets("Here the Images folder stored in Assets") or l = GridView.GetImageListFromAssets(File.DirAssets) or l = GridView.GetImageListFromAssets("") For n = 0 To l.Size-1 lv.AddSingleLine(l.Get(n)) next End Sub

method.name: SetArrayList
method.comment: Get or Sets an array.

method.name: isPauseOnFling
method.comment: Whether pause ImageLoader during fling

method.name: GetRealImagePath
method.comment: Return Real Image Path

method.name: ShowFromMediaStore
method.comment: Populate GridView from media store images

method.name: GetItem
method.comment:
Returns Item
Example:
i.Bitmap=LoadBitmap("",g.GetItem(Position))

method.name: AddImageFromWebAt
method.comment: Add an image from Web to the desired position in the GridView

method.name: ResumeEngine
method.comment: Resumes waiting load and display tasks

method.name: Pause
method.comment: Pause ImageLoader. All new load and display tasks won't be executed until ImageLoader is resumed. Already running tasks are not paused.

property.name: ShouldOnlyAnimateNewItems
property.comment: Get or Sets should only animate new item.

property.name: SetImageOnFail
property.comment: Sets own icon on fail

property.name: TextGravity
property.comment: Get or Sets the horizontal alignment of the text that will be used.

property.name: TextLines
property.comment: Get or Sets the TextView exactly this many lines tall.

property.name: TextColor
property.comment: Get or Sets Text Color - by default White

property.name: CompressQuality
property.comment:
Get or Sets the quality of a bitmap, that can be compressed. [ 0 = low -> 100 = high ]
by default 100

property.name: TextSize
property.comment: Get or Sets Text Size - by default 14

property.name: PauseOnScroll
property.comment: Whether pause ImageLoader during touch scrolling

property.name: TextStyle
property.comment: Sets the style in which the text should be displayed.

property.name: Tag
property.comment: Get or Sets this view's tag.

property.name: TransitionEffect
property.comment: Get or Sets the desired transition effect.

property.name: Version
property.comment: Author and Version of the library

property.name: SimulateGridWithList
property.comment: Get or Sets simulate grid with list.

property.name: MaxAnimationVelocity
property.comment: Get or Sets max animation velocity.

property.name: TransitionDuration
property.comment: Get or Sets transition duration.

property.name: TextTypeFace
property.comment: Get or Sets the typeface and style in which the text should be displayed. Note that not all Typeface families actually have bold and italic variants, so you may need to use TextStyle(style) to get the appearance that you actually want.

property.name: ProgressBarVisible
property.comment: Set the enabled state of this view. - by default is true

property.name: TextBackGroundAlpha
property.comment: Get or Sets alpha property of the view, as a value between 0 (completely transparent) and 255 (completely opaque). by default alpha = 0

property.name: ScaleType
property.comment:
Controls how the image should be resized or moved to match the size of this ImageView.
by default ScaleTypeFIT_XY

property.name: CacheOnDisk
property.comment: Sets whether loaded image will be cached on disk.

property.name: SetNoEffect
property.comment: Show thumbnails with corner radius or oval. - by default is true

property.name: PauseOnFling
property.comment: Whether pause ImageLoader during fling

property.name: RoundedBitmap
property.comment: Can display bitmap with rounded corners. - by default is false

property.name: VerticalSpacing
property.comment: Defines the default vertical spacing between rows.

property.name: SetCornerRadius
property.comment: Set the corner Radius - by default is 0

property.name: RemoveAt
property.comment: Removes the item at the specified location from this list.

property.name: HorizontalSpacing
property.comment: Defines the default horizontal spacing between columns..

property.name: ShowText
property.comment: Get or Sets the visibility of the text - by default is hide

property.name: LoadFontFromAssets
property.comment: Loads a new Typeface from the specified font data.

property.name: TextPosition
property.comment: Get or Sets the position alignment of the text that will be used. param Text_Top_OutSide param Text_Top_Inside param Text_Center_Inside param Text_Bottom_Inside

property.name: Gravity
property.comment: Specifies the gravity within each cell.

property.name: ItemHeight
property.comment: Get or Set ItemHeight

property.name: DelayBeforeLoading
property.comment: Sets delay time before starting loading task. Default - no delay.

property.name: LoadFontFromFile
property.comment: Loads a new Typeface from the specified font data.

property.name: SetImageOnLoading
property.comment: Sets own icon on loading

property.name: ScaleTypeForRounded
property.comment:
Controls how the RoundedBitmap should be resized or moved to match the size of this ImageView.
by default ScaleType.FIT_CENTER

property.name: SetBorderWidth
property.comment: Set the border Width - by default is 0

property.name: FadeInTime
property.comment: Duration of "fade-in" animation (in milliseconds) Whether animation should be played if image is loaded from network Whether animation should be played if image is loaded from disk cache Whether animation should be played if image is loaded from memory cache

property.name: ShowMessageError
property.comment: Set to true if you want to display an error message.

property.name: CompressFormat
property.comment:
Get or Sets the known formats a bitmap can be compressed into [ JPG or PNG ]
by default PNG

property.name: NumColumns
property.comment: Get or Sets the number of columns in the grid.

property.name: SetBorderColor
property.comment: Set the border Color - by default is transparent

property.name: ShouldOnlyAnimateFling
property.comment: Get or Sets should only animate fling.

property.name: ProgressBarIndeterminate
property.comment: Change the indeterminate mode for this progress bar.

property.name: StretchMode
property.comment:
Defines how columns should stretch to fill the available empty space, if any.
Examples:
GridView.StretchMode = GridView.StretchMode.STRETCH_SPACING

property.name: Length
property.comment: Returns length

property.name: CacheInMemory
property.comment: Sets whether loaded image will be cached in memory.

property.name: ColumnWidth
property.comment: Get or Sets Specifies the fixed width for each column.

property.name: ItemWidth
property.comment: Get or Sets ItemWidth

property.name: Selection
property.comment: Get or Sets the currently selected item.

field.name: Center_Crop
field.comment: Scale the image uniformly (maintain the image's aspect ratio) so that both dimensions (width and height) of the image will be equal to or larger than the corresponding dimension of the view (minus padding).

field.name: Matrix
field.comment: Scale using the image matrix when drawing.

field.name: Center
field.comment: Center the image in the view, but perform no scaling.

field.name: Center_Inside
field.comment: Scale the image uniformly (maintain the image's aspect ratio) so that both dimensions (width and height) of the image will be equal to or less than the corresponding dimension of the view (minus padding).
